p: Refined sunflower (SFO) and soybean (SBO) oils were bought from a local market. The dried leaves of marjoram ( Origanum majorana L.), thyme ( Thymus vulgaris L.), and oregano ( Origanum vulgare L.) were purchased from a local food store in Warsaw. All the solvents ( n-hexane, methanol, ethanol, acetone, diethyl ether, and chloroform) and reagents (potassium hydroxide, acetic acid, butylated hydroxyanisole—BHA, and certified fatty acids methyl ester reference standard mixture) were of analytical grade and used without further purification. They were purchased from Avantor Performance Materials (Gliwice, Poland) and from Sigma-Aldrich Chemicals (Poznań, Poland).
